user.title: Set up Combined Lights
user.description: Configure light zones that will be controlled by breakpoints and brightness ranges.

data_description.name: A unique name for this controller (e.g., Living Room Combined Lights).
data_description.background_lights: Select all lights that act as background or ambient lighting.
data_description.feature_lights: Select all lights that highlight specific features or objects.

advanced.title: Advanced Configuration
advanced.description: Configure breakpoints and brightness ranges for each zone.

data_description.breakpoints: Three values defining slider stages (e.g., [30, 60, 90] for 1-30%, 31-60%, 61-90%, 91-100%).
data_description.background_brightness_ranges: Four [min, max] brightness ranges for background lights at each stage.
data_description.feature_brightness_ranges: Four [min, max] brightness ranges for feature lights at each stage.
data_description.ceiling_brightness_ranges: Four [min, max] brightness ranges for ceiling lights at each stage.
